LightningComponentBundle.description: Interactive map displaying Salesforce Account records with geolocation data. Users can search for accounts within a configurable radius of a specified account.

property.name: radiusMiles
property.label: Search Radius (Miles)
property.description: The radius in miles to search for accounts around the specified location. Default is 50 miles.

property.name: initialLimit
property.label: Initial Account Limit
property.description: Maximum number of accounts to display on initial load. Default is 500 accounts.
